translated: the second, third, and fourth concentrations, the sign of space, the sign of the base of infinite consciousness, the sign of the base of nothingness, the sign of the base of neither perception nor non-perception,

analyzed: 'byung ba rgyu mtshan dang / 'jig pa rgyu mtshan dang / dngos po rgyu mtshan dang / dngos po med pa rgyu mtshan dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa rgyu mtshan dang / rnam par byang ba rgyu mtshan dang / mthong ba dang / thos pa dang /
translated: the sign of the elements, the sign of destruction, the sign of things, the sign of non-things, the sign of thorough affliction, the sign of complete purification, seeing, hearing,

original: bye brag phyed pa dang / rnam par shes pa dang / thos pa dang / yongs su btsal ba rgyu mtshan dang ; yid kyis rjes su brtags pa dang / rjes su dpyad pa rgyu mtshan dang / de ltar de lta bu dang mthun pa rgyu mtshan gzhan gang yin pa dang /
analyzed: bye brag phyed pa dang / rnam par shes pa dang / thos pa dang / yongs su btsal ba rgyu mtshan dang ; yid kyis rjes su brtags pa dang / rjes su dpyad pa rgyu mtshan dang / de ltar de lta bu dang mthun pa rgyu mtshan gzhan gang yin pa dang /
translated: The specific characteristics, consciousness, hearing, investigation, mental scrutiny, analysis, and any other such causes.

original: gzhan yang rgyu mtshan drug ste /
analyzed: gzhan yang rgyu mtshan drug ste /
translated: There are also six other causes:

original: mtshan ma dang bcas pa rgyu mtshan dang / mtshan ma med pa rgyu mtshan dang / chung ngu rgyu mtshan dang ; chen por gyur pa rgyu mtshan dang / tshad med pa rgyu mtshan dang / ci yang med pa rgyu mtshan no /
analyzed: mtshan ma dang bcas pa rgyu mtshan dang / mtshan ma med pa rgyu mtshan dang / chung ngu rgyu mtshan dang ; chen por gyur pa rgyu mtshan dang / tshad med pa rgyu mtshan dang / ci yang med pa rgyu mtshan no /
translated: the cause of having signs, the cause of being signless, the cause of being small, the cause of being great, the cause of being immeasurable, and the cause of being nothingness.

original: mtshan ma dang bcas pa rgyu mtshan gang zhe na /
analyzed: mtshan ma dang bcas pa rgyu mtshan gang zhe na /
translated: What is the cause of having signs?

original: dngos po rtogs pa'i ming la rnam par rtog pa'i mtshan ma gang yin pa'o //
analyzed: dngos po rtogs pa'i ming la rnam par rtog pa'i mtshan ma gang yin pa'o //
translated: It is the sign of conceptual thoughts about the name of an object that is understood.

original: mtshan ma med pa rgyu mtshan gang zhe na /🔽dngos @4a * //
analyzed: mtshan ma med pa rgyu mtshan gang zhe na /🔽dngos @4a * //
translated: What is the cause of being signless?🔽It is the sign of conceptual thoughts about the name of an object that is not understood.

original: po ma rtogs pa'i ming la rnam par rtog pa'i mtshan ma gang yin pa'o //
analyzed: po ma rtogs pa'i ming la rnam par rtog pa'i mtshan ma gang yin pa'o //
translated: The name of the sign of discursive thought is the small cause.

original: chung ngu rgyu mtshan gang zhe na /
analyzed: chung ngu rgyu mtshan gang zhe na /
translated: What is the small cause?

original: 'dod pa'i khams kyi dngos po la rnam par rtog pa'i mtshan ma gang yin pa'o //
analyzed: 'dod pa'i khams kyi dngos po la rnam par rtog pa'i mtshan ma gang yin pa'o //
translated: It is the sign of discursive thought concerning the things of the realm of desire.

original: chen por gyur pa rgyu mtshan gang zhe na /
analyzed: chen por gyur pa rgyu mtshan gang zhe na /
translated: What is the great cause?

original: gzugs kyi khams kyi dngos po la rnam par rtog pa'i mtshan ma gang yin pa'o //
analyzed: gzugs kyi khams kyi dngos po la rnam par rtog pa'i mtshan ma gang yin pa'o //
translated: It is the sign of discursive thought concerning the things of the realm of form.

original: tshad med pa rgyu mtshan gang zhe na /
analyzed: tshad med pa rgyu mtshan gang zhe na /
translated: What is the immeasurable cause?

original: gzugs med pa'i khams kyi dngos po nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang / rnam shes mtha' yas skyed mched la rnam par rtog pa'i mtshan ma gang yin pa'o //
analyzed: gzugs med pa'i khams kyi dngos po nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang / rnam shes mtha' yas skyed mched la rnam par rtog pa'i mtshan ma gang yin pa'o //
translated: It is the sign of discursive thought concerning the things of the formless realm, namely, the sphere of infinite space and the sphere of infinite consciousness.

original: ci yang med pa rgyu mtshan gang zhe na /
analyzed: ci yang med pa rgyu mtshan gang zhe na /
translated: What is the signless cause?

original: gzugs med pa'i khams kyi dngos po ci yang med pa'i skye mched la rnam par rtog pa'i mtshan ma gang yin pa'o //
analyzed: gzugs med pa'i khams kyi dngos po ci yang med pa'i skye mched la rnam par rtog pa'i mtshan ma gang yin pa'o //
translated: It is the sign of discursive thought concerning the things of the formless realm, namely, the sphere of nothingness.

original: gzhan yang rgyu mtshan lnga ste /
analyzed: gzhan yang rgyu mtshan lnga ste /
translated: Furthermore, there are five other causes:

original: rgyu mtshan rgyu mtshan dang / ming rgyu mtshan dang / rnam par rtog pa rgyu mtshan dang / de bzhin nyid rgyu mtshan dang / yang dag pa'i shes pa rgyu mtshan no //
analyzed: rgyu mtshan rgyu mtshan dang / ming rgyu mtshan dang / rnam par rtog pa rgyu mtshan dang / de bzhin nyid rgyu mtshan dang / yang dag pa'i shes pa rgyu mtshan no //
translated: reason of cause, reason of name, reason of concept, reason of reality, and reason of right knowledge.

original: yang rgyu mtshan gzhan gnyis te /
analyzed: yang rgyu mtshan gzhan gnyis te /
translated: There are two other reasons:

original: rang bzhin rgyu mtshan dang / gzugs brnyan rgyu mtshan no //
analyzed: rang bzhin rgyu mtshan dang / gzugs brnyan rgyu mtshan no //
translated: reason of nature and reason of reflection.

original: rang bzhin rgyu mtshan gang zhe na /
analyzed: rang bzhin rgyu mtshan gang zhe na /
translated: What is the reason of nature?

original: sngon gyi rnam par rtog pas bskyed pa'i mtshan ma dang / mtshan mas bskyed pa grags pa'i mtshan ma'o //
analyzed: sngon gyi rnam par rtog pas bskyed pa'i mtshan ma dang / mtshan mas bskyed pa grags pa'i mtshan ma'o //
translated: It is the sign produced by former imagination and the sign produced by the sign.

original: gzugs brnyan rgyu mtshan gang zhe na /
analyzed: gzugs brnyan rgyu mtshan gang zhe na /
translated: What is the reason of reflection?

original: kun brtags pa gang yin pa de ni mos pas snang ba yin gyi /
analyzed: kun brtags pa gang yin pa de ni mos pas snang ba yin gyi /
translated: It is the reflection of the imagined.

original: rang bzhin du gnas pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: rang bzhin du gnas pa ni ma yin no //
translated: It is not the natural reflection.

original: ming gi rnam pa gang zhe na /
analyzed: ming gi rnam pa gang zhe na /
translated: What is the form of name?

original: de yang rgyu mtshan gyi dbang gis rnam pa sna tshogs dpag tu med do //
analyzed: de yang rgyu mtshan gyi dbang gis rnam pa sna tshogs dpag tu med do //
translated: It is the various and innumerable forms of name according to the power of the reason.

original: de yang mdor bsdu na rnam pa bcu gnyis te /
analyzed: de yang mdor bsdu na rnam pa bcu gnyis te /
translated: In brief, it is of twelve kinds.

original: tha snyad las byung ba dang / yang dag pa'i dngos po dang / rigs dang 'brel ba dang / so so dang 'brel ba dang / yon tan las byung ba dang / nye bar brtags pa dang / grags pa dang / ma grags pa dang /
analyzed: tha snyad las byung ba dang / yang dag pa'i dngos po dang / rigs dang 'brel ba dang / so so dang 'brel ba dang / yon tan las byung ba dang / nye bar brtags pa dang / grags pa dang / ma grags pa dang /
translated: that which arises from verbal expression, that which arises from real things, that which is related to the universal characteristic, that which is related to the individual characteristic, that which arises from the excellences, that which is imagined, that which is well known, that which is not well known,

original: gsal ba dang / mi gsal ba dang / bsdus pa dang / tha dad pa'o //
analyzed: gsal ba dang / mi gsal ba dang / bsdus pa dang / tha dad pa'o //
translated: that which is clear, that which is unclear, that which is concise, and that which is extensive.

original: rnam par rtog pa'i rnam pa gang zhe na /
analyzed: rnam par rtog pa'i rnam pa gang zhe na /
translated: What is the mode of mental activity that is discursive thought?

original: de yang rgyu mtshan dang / ming gi dbang gis rnam pa sna tshogs dpag tu med do //
analyzed: de yang rgyu mtshan dang / ming gi dbang gis rnam pa sna tshogs dpag tu med do //
translated: It is the mode of mental activity that is discursive thought in its various forms, which is infinite and arises from the influence of signs and names.

original: de yang mdor bsdu na rnam pa bdun du rig par bya ste /
analyzed: de yang mdor bsdu na rnam pa bdun du rig par bya ste /
translated: In brief, it should be understood as being of seven kinds:

original: mtshan ma las byung ba dang / mtshan ma med @4b pa las byung ba dang / yul la rang gi ngang gis 'jug pa dang / tshol ba pa dang / so sor rtog pa dang / nyon mongs pa can dang / nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'o //
analyzed: mtshan ma las byung ba dang / mtshan ma med @4b pa las byung ba dang / yul la rang gi ngang gis 'jug pa dang / tshol ba pa dang / so sor rtog pa dang / nyon mongs pa can dang / nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'o //
translated: that which arises from signs, that which arises from the absence of signs, that which is naturally engaged in the object, that which is engaged in seeking, that which is engaged in discerning, that which is defiled, and that which is undefiled.

original: de bzhin nyid kyi rnam pa gang zhe na /
analyzed: de bzhin nyid kyi rnam pa gang zhe na /
translated: What is the mode of mental activity that is suchness?

original: smras pa / brjod du med pa'i rnam pa yin no //
analyzed: smras pa / brjod du med pa'i rnam pa yin no //
translated: He replied, “It is the aspect of the inexpressible.🔽”

original: yang dag pa'i shes pa'i rnam pa gang zhe na /
analyzed: yang dag pa'i shes pa'i rnam pa gang zhe na /
translated: “What is the aspect of right knowledge?🔽”

original: smras pa / 'jig rten las 'das pa gang yin pa de ni brjod du med pa'i rnam pa yin no //
analyzed: smras pa / 'jig rten las 'das pa gang yin pa de ni brjod du med pa'i rnam pa yin no //
translated: He replied, “That which is supramundane is the aspect of the inexpressible.

original: 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa gang yin pa de ni rnam par gzhag pa'i bden pa 'dzin pa'i rnam pa yin no //🔽de la mtshan ma dang / gzugs brnyan dang / mig yor dang / srid pa dang / spros pa dang / 'jig tshogs dang / 'dus byas dang / bsams pa dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba dang / de lta bu la sogs pa ni rgyu mtshan gyi rnam grangs yin no //
analyzed: 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa gang yin pa de ni rnam par gzhag pa'i bden pa 'dzin pa'i rnam pa yin no // de la mtshan ma dang / gzugs brnyan dang / mig yor dang / srid pa dang / spros pa dang / 'jig tshogs dang / 'dus byas dang / bsams pa dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba dang / de lta bu la sogs pa ni rgyu mtshan gyi rnam grangs yin no //
translated: That which is both mundane and supramundane is the aspect of the apprehension of the truth of the established order.🔽”🔽“In this regard, the synonyms of ‘sign’ are ‘reflection,’ ‘image,’ ‘optical illusion,’ ‘existence,’ ‘conceptual elaboration,’ ‘perishable collection,’ ‘conditioned,’ ‘thought,’ ‘dependent origination,’ and so forth.

original: de la ming dang / brda dang / gdags pa dang / tha snyad dang / kun rdzob dang / nye bar 'dogs pa dang / brjod pa dang / de lta bu la sogs pa ni ming gi rnam grangs yin no /
analyzed: de la ming dang / brda dang / gdags pa dang / tha snyad dang / kun rdzob dang / nye bar 'dogs pa dang / brjod pa dang / de lta bu la sogs pa ni ming gi rnam grangs yin no /
translated: The synonyms of ‘name’ are ‘symbol,’ ‘conventional designation,’ ‘convention,’ ‘allusion,’ ‘superficial,’ ‘attribution,’ ‘expression,’ and so forth.

original: de la rnam par rtog pa dang / kun du rtog pa dang / yongs su rtog pa dang / log pa'i lam dang / log pa'i sgrub pa dang / rgyun gol ba dang / yang dag par 'dzin pa ma yin pa dang / de lta bu la sogs pa ni rnam par rtog pa'i rnam grangs yin no //
analyzed: de la rnam par rtog pa dang / kun du rtog pa dang / yongs su rtog pa dang / log pa'i lam dang / log pa'i sgrub pa dang / rgyun gol ba dang / yang dag par 'dzin pa ma yin pa dang / de lta bu la sogs pa ni rnam par rtog pa'i rnam grangs yin no //
translated: In this regard, conceptualization, thorough conceptualization, complete conceptualization, wrong path, wrong practice, deviation from the continuum, non-grasping, and so on are synonyms for conceptualization.

original: de la de bzhin nyid dang / yang dag pa nyid dang / bden pa nyid dang / ma nor ba nyid dang / phyin ci log pa nyid dang / spros pa med pa'i dbyings dang / mtshan ma med pa'i dbyings dang / chos kyi dbyings dang /
analyzed: de la de bzhin nyid dang / yang dag pa nyid dang / bden pa nyid dang / ma nor ba nyid dang / phyin ci log pa nyid dang / spros pa med pa'i dbyings dang / mtshan ma med pa'i dbyings dang / chos kyi dbyings dang /
translated: In this regard, suchness, reality, truth, non-erroneousness, non-distortion, the sphere of no proliferation, the sphere of no characteristics, the dharma-sphere,

original: yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / de lta bu la sogs pa ni de bzhin nyid kyi rnam grangs yin no //
analyzed: yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / de lta bu la sogs pa ni de bzhin nyid kyi rnam grangs yin no //
translated: the limit of reality, and so on are synonyms for suchness.

original: de la yang dag pa'i shes pa dang / yang dag pa'i shes rab dang / yang dag pa'i rtogs pa dang / yang dag pa'i lam dang / yang dag pa'i sgrub pa dang / yang dag pa'i rgyun dang / yang dag par 'dzin pa dang /
analyzed: de la yang dag pa'i shes pa dang / yang dag pa'i shes rab dang / yang dag pa'i rtogs pa dang / yang dag pa'i lam dang / yang dag pa'i sgrub pa dang / yang dag pa'i rgyun dang / yang dag par 'dzin pa dang /
translated: Right knowledge, right wisdom, right understanding, right path, right practice, right continuity, right grasping,

original: de lta bu la sogs pa ni yang dag pa'i shes pa'i rnam grangs yin no //🔽dngos po lnga po gang dag yin pa de dag las du zhig gzugs yin /
analyzed: de lta bu la sogs pa ni yang dag pa'i shes pa'i rnam grangs yin no // dngos po lnga po gang dag yin pa de dag las du zhig gzugs yin /
translated: these and others are synonyms of right knowledge.

original: du zhig sems yin /🔽du zhig sems las byung @5a * //
analyzed: du zhig sems yin / du zhig sems las byung @5a * //
translated: Among these five things, how many are form, how many are mind,

original: ba dag yin /
analyzed: ba dag yin /
translated: how many are mental factors,

original: du zhig sems dang mi ldan pa dag yin /
analyzed: du zhig sems dang mi ldan pa dag yin /
translated: how many are not associated with mind,

original: du zhig 'dus ma byas pa dag yin zhe na /
analyzed: du zhig 'dus ma byas pa dag yin zhe na /
translated: and how many are unconditioned?

original: smras pa / rgyu mtshan ni rnam pa lnga tshar yin no //
analyzed: smras pa / rgyu mtshan ni rnam pa lnga tshar yin no //
translated: It is said: The five characteristics are a group of five.

original: ming ni sems dang mi ldan pa yin no //
analyzed: ming ni sems dang mi ldan pa yin no //
translated: Name is not associated with mind.

original: rnam par rtog pa dang yang dag pa'i shes pa ni /
analyzed: rnam par rtog pa dang yang dag pa'i shes pa ni /
translated: Imagination and right knowledge

original: sems dang sems las byung ba dag yin no //
analyzed: sems dang sems las byung ba dag yin no //
translated: are mind and mental factors.

original: de bzhin nyid ni 'dus ma byas yin no //
analyzed: de bzhin nyid ni 'dus ma byas yin no //
translated: Suchness is unconditioned.

original: du zhig phung pos bsdus pa dag yin /
analyzed: du zhig phung pos bsdus pa dag yin /
translated: How many are included in the aggregates?

original: du zhig ma bsdus pa dag yin zhe na /
analyzed: du zhig ma bsdus pa dag yin zhe na /
translated: How many are not included?

original: smras pa / gsum ni phung pos bsdus pa dag yin no //
analyzed: smras pa / gsum ni phung pos bsdus pa dag yin no //
translated: It is said: Three are included in the aggregates.

original: rgyu mtshan ni bsdus pa dang ma bsdus pa yin no //
analyzed: rgyu mtshan ni bsdus pa dang ma bsdus pa yin no //
translated: The reason is included and not included.

original: de bzhin nyid ni ma bsdus pa yin no //
analyzed: de bzhin nyid ni ma bsdus pa yin no //
translated: Suchness is not included.

original: du zhig khams dang skye mched kyis bsdus pa dag yin /
analyzed: du zhig khams dang skye mched kyis bsdus pa dag yin /
translated: How many are included in the elements and sense bases?

original: du zhig ma bsdus pa dag yin zhe na /
analyzed: du zhig ma bsdus pa dag yin zhe na /
translated: How many are not included?

original: smras pa / thams cad kyang bsdus pa dag yin no /
analyzed: smras pa / thams cad kyang bsdus pa dag yin no /
translated: It is said: All are included.

original: du zhig rten cing 'brel bar 'byung bas bsdus pa dag yin /
analyzed: du zhig rten cing 'brel bar 'byung bas bsdus pa dag yin /
translated: How many are included in dependent origination?

original: du zhig ma bsdus pa dag yin zhe na /
analyzed: du zhig ma bsdus pa dag yin zhe na /
translated: How many are not included?

original: smras pa / gsum ni bsdus pa yin no //
analyzed: smras pa / gsum ni bsdus pa yin no //
translated: It is said: Three are included.

original: rgyu mtshan ni bsdus pa dang ma bsdus pa yin no //
analyzed: rgyu mtshan ni bsdus pa dang ma bsdus pa yin no //
translated: The reason is included and not included.

original: de bzhin nyid ni ma bsdus pa yin no //
analyzed: de bzhin nyid ni ma bsdus pa yin no //
translated: Suchness is not included.

original: rten cing 'brel par 'byung bas bsdus pa dang ma bsdus pa dag ji lta ba bzhin du /
analyzed: rten cing 'brel par 'byung bas bsdus pa dang ma bsdus pa dag ji lta ba bzhin du /
translated: Just as they are included and not included in dependent origination,

original: gnas dang gnas ma yin pa dang / dbang pos bsdus pa dang ma bsdus pa dag kyang de bzhin du blta bar bya'o //
analyzed: gnas dang gnas ma yin pa dang / dbang pos bsdus pa dang ma bsdus pa dag kyang de bzhin du blta bar bya'o //
translated: The same should be understood for the included and non-included in the possible and impossible, and in the faculties.

original: du zhig bden pas bsdus pa dag yin /
analyzed: du zhig bden pas bsdus pa dag yin /
translated: How many are included in the truths?

original: du zhig ma bsdus pa dag yin zhe na /
analyzed: du zhig ma bsdus pa dag yin zhe na /
translated: How many are not included?

original: smras pa / bden pa ni rnam pa gnyis te /
analyzed: smras pa / bden pa ni rnam pa gnyis te /
translated: It is said: There are two kinds of truths:

original: rnam par bzhag pa dang / rnam par ma bzhag pa'o //
analyzed: rnam par bzhag pa dang / rnam par ma bzhag pa'o //
translated: truths as designations and truths as non-designations.

original: de la 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi ni rnam par bzhag pa'i bden pa yin no //
analyzed: de la 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi ni rnam par bzhag pa'i bden pa yin no //
translated: Among them, the four noble truths are truths as designations.

original: de bzhin nyid ni rnam par ma bzhag pa'i bden pa yin no //
analyzed: de bzhin nyid ni rnam par ma bzhag pa'i bden pa yin no //
translated: Suchness is a truth as non-designation.

original: de la gsum ni rnam par bzhag pa'i bden pas bsdus pa yin no //
analyzed: de la gsum ni rnam par bzhag pa'i bden pas bsdus pa yin no //
translated: Among them, three are included in truths as designations.

original: rgyu mtshan ni bsdus pa dang ma bsdus pa yin no //
analyzed: rgyu mtshan ni bsdus pa dang ma bsdus pa yin no //
translated: The reason is both included and not included.

original: de bzhin nyid ni rnam par ma bzhag pa'i bden pas bsdus pa kho na yin no //
analyzed: de bzhin nyid ni rnam par ma bzhag pa'i bden pas bsdus pa kho na yin no //
translated: Suchness is only included in truths as non-designations.

original: du zhig rgyu'i rkyen gyis bsdus pa dag yin no //
analyzed: du zhig rgyu'i rkyen gyis bsdus pa dag yin no //
translated: How many are included in the causal condition?

original: du zhig mtshungs pa de ma thag pa dang / dmigs pa dang / bdag po'i rkyen gyis bsdus pa dag yin zhe na /
analyzed: du zhig mtshungs pa de ma thag pa dang / dmigs pa dang / bdag po'i rkyen gyis bsdus pa dag yin zhe na /
translated: How many are included in the condition as the equivalent and immediate antecedent, the objective, and the dominant?

original: smras pa / rgyu mtshan ni thams cad kyis bsdus pa dag yin no //
analyzed: smras pa / rgyu mtshan ni thams cad kyis bsdus pa dag yin no //
translated: It is said: They are all included in the reason.

original: ming ni mtshungs pa de ma thag pa'i @5b rkyen gyis ma bsdus pa yin no //
analyzed: ming ni mtshungs pa de ma thag pa'i @5b rkyen gyis ma bsdus pa yin no //
translated: Name is not included in the condition as the equivalent and immediate antecedent.

original: rnam par rtog pa dang / yang dag pa'i shes pa ni bzhi char gyis bsdus pa yin no //
analyzed: rnam par rtog pa dang / yang dag pa'i shes pa ni bzhi char gyis bsdus pa yin no //
translated: Imagination and right knowledge are included in all four.

original: de bzhin nyid ni dmigs pa'i rkyen gyis bsdus pa kho na yin no //
analyzed: de bzhin nyid ni dmigs pa'i rkyen gyis bsdus pa kho na yin no //
translated: Suchness is included only in the objective condition.

original: du zhig chos la rton pas bsdus pa dag yin no //
analyzed: du zhig chos la rton pas bsdus pa dag yin no //
translated: How many are included in the reliance on the teaching?

original: du zhig don dang / nges pa'i don gyi mdo sde dang / ye shes la rton pas bsdus pa dag yin zhe na /
analyzed: du zhig don dang / nges pa'i don gyi mdo sde dang / ye shes la rton pas bsdus pa dag yin zhe na /
translated: How many are included in the reliance on the meaning, the sutra of definitive meaning, and knowledge?

original: smras pa / rgyu mtshan rtog pa gsum gyis bsdus pa yin no //
analyzed: smras pa / rgyu mtshan rtog pa gsum gyis bsdus pa yin no //
translated: It is said: They are included in the three imaginations.

original: ming ni chos la rton pas bsdus pa kho na yin no //
analyzed: ming ni chos la rton pas bsdus pa kho na yin no //
translated: Name is included only in the reliance on the teaching.

original: rgyu mtshan ji lta ba bzhin du rnam par rtog pa yang de bzhin no //
analyzed: rgyu mtshan ji lta ba bzhin du rnam par rtog pa yang de bzhin no //

original: yang dag pa'i shes pa ni bsgoms pa las byung ba yin la /

original: rnam pa gsum char gyi spyod yul yin no //

translated: It is the domain of all three.

analyzed: du zhig stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid kyi spyod yul dag yin /

analyzed: du zhig smon pa med pa dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mtshan ma med pa'i spyod yul dag yin zhe na /

original: smras pa / rgyu mtshan ni rnam pa gsum char yin la /
analyzed: smras pa / rgyu mtshan ni rnam pa gsum char yin la /

translated: It is the domain of all three.

original: ming ni rnam pa gsum char ma yin la /

analyzed: de bzhin nyid ni rnam pa gsum char yang ma yin la /

analyzed: stong pa nyid kyi spyod yul dang / mtshan ma med pa'i spyod yul yin no //

original: yang dag pa'i shes pa ni rnam pa gsum char yin la /
analyzed: yang dag pa'i shes pa ni rnam pa gsum char yin la /
translated: Right knowledge is of all three kinds.

original: stong pa nyid kyi spyod yul yin no //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyi spyod yul yin no //

analyzed: gang du stong pa nyid dang / smon pa med pa dang / mtshan ma med pa bye brag med par gsungs pa der ni de dag thos pa dang / bsams pa dang / bsgoms pa las byung ba nyid yin par blta bar bya'o //

original: gang du de dag ting nge 'dzin gyi sgra kho nar gsungs pa der @8a * //
analyzed: gang du de dag ting nge 'dzin gyi sgra kho nar gsungs pa der @8a * //

original: ni de dag bsgoms pa las byung ba 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa yin par blta bar bya'o //
analyzed: ni de dag bsgoms pa las byung ba 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa yin par blta bar bya'o //

original: gang du de dag rnam par thar pa'i sgo'i sgra kho nar gsungs pa der ni de dag 'jig rten las 'das pa nyid yin par blta bar bya'o //
analyzed: gang du de dag rnam par thar pa'i sgo'i sgra kho nar gsungs pa der ni de dag 'jig rten las 'das pa nyid yin par blta bar bya'o //
translated: Where they are taught only as the doors of liberation, they should be understood as being supramundane.

original: du zhig lhag pa'i tshul khrims dang / lhag pa'i tshul khrims kyi 'khor dag yin /
analyzed: du zhig lhag pa'i tshul khrims dang / lhag pa'i tshul khrims kyi 'khor dag yin /

original: du zhig lhag pa'i sems dang / lhag pa'i shes rab dang / lhag pa'i sems dang / lhag pa'i shes rab kyi spyod yul dag yin zhe na /

analyzed: smras pa / rgyu mtshan ni lhag pa'i tshul khrims kyang yin /

analyzed: lhag pa'i tshul khrims kyi 'khor kyang yin //

original: lhag pa'i sems dang / lhag pa'i shes rab kyang yin /
analyzed: lhag pa'i sems dang / lhag pa'i shes rab kyang yin /

original: de dag gi spyod yul yang yin no //
analyzed: de dag gi spyod yul yang yin no //

analyzed: ming ni lhag pa'i tshul khrims kyi 'khor dang / lhag pa'i sems dang / lhag pa'i shes rab kyi spyod yul yin no //

analyzed: rnam par rtog pa ni lhag pa'i sems dang / lhag pa'i shes rab yin la /

analyzed: de dag gi spyod yul dang lhag pa'i tshul khrims kyi 'khor kyang yin no //

original: de bzhin nyid ni rnam pa gsum char ma yin la /
analyzed: de bzhin nyid ni rnam pa gsum char ma yin la /

original: lhag pa'i sems dang / lhag pa'i shes rab kyi spyod yul yin no //
analyzed: lhag pa'i sems dang / lhag pa'i shes rab kyi spyod yul yin no //

original: yang dag pa'i shes pa ni lhag pa'i sems dang / lhag pa'i shes rab yin la /
analyzed: yang dag pa'i shes pa ni lhag pa'i sems dang / lhag pa'i shes rab yin la /

original: de gnyis kyi spyod yul dang lhag pa'i tshul khrims kyi 'khor kyang yin no //
analyzed: de gnyis kyi spyod yul dang lhag pa'i tshul khrims kyi 'khor kyang yin no //

analyzed: mi slob pa yang ma yin pa dag yin zhe na /

analyzed: ming ni bsgoms pas spang bar bya ba yin no //

analyzed: rnam par rtog pa ni mthong bas spang bar bya ba @8b dang / bsgoms pas spang bar bya ba yin no //

analyzed: de bzhin nyid ni spang bar bya ba ma yin no //

analyzed: yang dag pa'i shes pa ni spang bar bya ba yin pa kho na yin no //

analyzed: ming la dmigs nas du zhig ce na /

analyzed: chos dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'o //

analyzed: de bzhin nyid la dmigs nas du zhig ce na /

original: smras pa / gcig ste /
analyzed: smras pa / gcig ste /
translated: He says: One,

original: chos dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'o //
analyzed: chos dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'o //

analyzed: chor ba dang / sems dang / chos kyis mtshan nyid dag la yang de bzhin no //

analyzed: smras pa / gsum kho na ste rnam par rtog pa bzhin no //
translated: He says: Just three, like conceptualization.

original: mi spong bar brjod par bya zhe na /
analyzed: mi spong bar brjod par bya zhe na /
translated: One should say that it is abandoned.

original: smras pa / rnam par gnon pa'i spong bas spong bar brjod par bya'i ;
analyzed: smras pa / rnam par gnon pa'i spong bas spong bar brjod par bya'i ;
translated: One should say that it is abandoned by the abandonment of complete conquest,

original: bag la nyal yang dag par 'joms pa'i spong bas ni ma yin no //
analyzed: bag la nyal yang dag par 'joms pa'i spong bas ni ma yin no //
translated: but not by the abandonment of the complete destruction of latent tendencies.

original: rgyu mtshan la ji lta ba bzhin du ming dang rnam par rtog pa yang de bzhin no //
analyzed: rgyu mtshan la ji lta ba bzhin du ming dang rnam par rtog pa yang de bzhin no //
translated: As with the reason, so it is with the name and the conception.

original: de bzhin nyid la dmigs pa dang / yang dag par shes pa la dmigs pa dang / bag la nyal yang dag par 'joms pa'i spong bas kyang spong bar brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: de bzhin nyid la dmigs pa dang / yang dag par shes pa la dmigs pa dang / bag la nyal yang dag par 'joms pa'i spong bas kyang spong bar brjod par bya'o //
translated: One should say that it is abandoned by focusing on suchness, by focusing on right knowledge, and by the abandonment of the complete destruction of latent tendencies.

original: dngos po lnga po de dag las dngos po du zhig yid la byed pa na 'jig rten pa'i bsam gtan dang po la snyoms par 'jug ce na /
analyzed: dngos po lnga po de dag las dngos po du zhig yid la byed pa na 'jig rten pa'i bsam gtan dang po la snyoms par 'jug ce na /
translated: From among those five things, how many things should one attend to in order to enter into the first worldly meditative stabilization?

original: sems pa / 'dod pa dang ldan pa dang / bsam gtan dang po'i sa pa dang ldan pa'i rgyu mtshan dang / ming dang rnam par rtog pa yid la byed pa na'o //

translated: when one attends to the sign, name and conceptualization associated with the first absorption level, and with the mental factors associated with the first absorption level.

original: de bzhin du 'og ma pha dang / bsam gtan gnyis pa'i sa pa dang ldan pa'i rgyu mtshan dang / ming dang / rnam par rtog pa yid la byed pa na 'jig rten pa'i bsam gtan gnyis pa la snyoms par 'jug go / bsam gtan dang /🔽gzugs med pa'i @9a * //
analyzed: de bzhin du 'og ma pha dang / bsam gtan gnyis pa'i sa pa dang ldan pa'i rgyu mtshan dang / ming dang / rnam par rtog pa yid la byed pa na 'jig rten pa'i bsam gtan gnyis pa la snyoms par 'jug go / bsam gtan dang / gzugs med pa'i @9a * //
translated: Similarly, when one attends to the sign, name and conceptualization associated with the second absorption level, one enters the mundane second absorption.

original: snyoms par 'jug pa lhag ma rnams la yang de bzhin du ci rigs par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: snyoms par 'jug pa lhag ma rnams la yang de bzhin du ci rigs par rig par bya'o //
translated: The remaining meditative attainments of the absorptions and formless states should be understood in the same way, according to their individual characteristics.

original: dngos po du zhig yid la byed pa na 'jig rten las 'das pa'i bsam gtan dang po la snyoms par 'jug ce na /
analyzed: dngos po du zhig yid la byed pa na 'jig rten las 'das pa'i bsam gtan dang po la snyoms par 'jug ce na /
translated: How many things are attended to when one enters the first supramundane absorption?

original: smras pa / 'dod pa dang ldan pa dang / bsam gtan dang po'i sa pa dang ldan pa'i rgyu mtshan dang / ming dang rnam par rtog pa de dag nyid kyi de bzhin nyid yid la byed pa na'o //
analyzed: smras pa / 'dod pa dang ldan pa dang / bsam gtan dang po'i sa pa dang ldan pa'i rgyu mtshan dang / ming dang rnam par rtog pa de dag nyid kyi de bzhin nyid yid la byed pa na'o //
translated: He says: When one attends to the reality of those very signs, names, and conceptualizations that are associated with the desire realm and the first meditative absorption.

original: ci yang med pa'i skye mched kyi bar du yang de bzhin du ci rigs par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: ci yang med pa'i skye mched kyi bar du yang de bzhin du ci rigs par rig par bya'o //
translated: One should understand that the same is true up to the sphere of nothingness.

original: 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched la ni nges par 'jig rten pa kho nas so //
analyzed: 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched la ni nges par 'jig rten pa kho nas so //
translated: But in the case of the sphere of neither-perception-nor-non-perception, it is definitely only through the mundane path.

original: 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched dang ldan pa'i rgyu mtshan /
analyzed: 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched dang ldan pa'i rgyu mtshan /
translated: The signs associated with the sphere of neither-perception-nor-non-perception.

original: ci rgyu mtshan du brjod par bya'am zhe na /
analyzed: ci rgyu mtshan du brjod par bya'am zhe na /
translated: Should one speak of signs?

original: smras pa / mtshan ma med pa rgyu mtshan dang / cha phra ba rgyu mtshan du brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: smras pa / mtshan ma med pa rgyu mtshan dang / cha phra ba rgyu mtshan du brjod par bya'o //
translated: He says: One should speak of the signless as the sign and the subtle as the sign.

original: dngos po lnga po de dag la dad pa la sogs pa'i chos gang dag yin pa de dag ngo bo nyid gang dag dang / dmigs pa gang dag dang / bdag po gang dag gis dbang po'i ming 'thob ce na /
analyzed: dngos po lnga po de dag la dad pa la sogs pa'i chos gang dag yin pa de dag ngo bo nyid gang dag dang / dmigs pa gang dag dang / bdag po gang dag gis dbang po'i ming 'thob ce na /
translated: What are the natures of those things such as faith, etc., that are called faculties? What are their objects? What are their controlling faculties?

original: smras pa / rnam par rtog pa'i ngo bo nyid dang / ming dang rgyu mtshan la dmigs pa dang / de bzhin nyid dang yang dag pa'i shes pa'i bdag pos so //
analyzed: smras pa / rnam par rtog pa'i ngo bo nyid dang / ming dang rgyu mtshan la dmigs pa dang / de bzhin nyid dang yang dag pa'i shes pa'i bdag pos so //
translated: It is said: They have the nature of discrimination, the name and the causal process as their objects, and reality and right knowledge as their controlling faculties.

original: dbang po'i ming ji lta ba bzhin du stobs rnams kyi ming yang de bzhin no //
analyzed: dbang po'i ming ji lta ba bzhin du stobs rnams kyi ming yang de bzhin no //
translated: The names of the powers are the same as the names of the faculties.

original: gnas skabs gang la stobs kyi ming 'thob ce na /
analyzed: gnas skabs gang la stobs kyi ming 'thob ce na /
translated: In what state are they called powers?

original: smras pa / gang gi tshe dad pa la sogs pa'i dbang po de dag nyid ma dad pa la sogs pa dang ma 'dres shing ma 'dres pa'i chos nyid du gyur pa na'o //
analyzed: smras pa / gang gi tshe dad pa la sogs pa'i dbang po de dag nyid ma dad pa la sogs pa dang ma 'dres shing ma 'dres pa'i chos nyid du gyur pa na'o //
translated: It is said: When those faculties of faith, etc., are not mixed with lack of faith, etc., and are of the nature of unmixed dharmas.

original: dbang po dang / stobs dag ji lta ba bzhin du 'jig rten pa'i byang chub kyi yan lag dran pa la sogs pa gang dag yin pa de dag kyang byang chub kyi phyir yan lag yin pas rnam par rtog pa'i ngo bo nyid yin par blta bar bya'o //🔽'jig rten las 'das pa'i byang chub kyi yan lag dran pa la sogs pa gang dag yin pa de dag ni byang chub kyi yan lag yin pas yang dag pa'i shes pa'i ngo bo nyid dang / de bzhin nyid la dmigs pa dang / rnam par gzhag pa'i bden pa rtog pa'i bdag po yin par blta bar bya'o //
analyzed: dbang po dang / stobs dag ji lta ba bzhin du 'jig rten pa'i byang chub kyi yan lag dran pa la sogs pa gang dag yin pa de dag kyang byang chub kyi phyir yan lag yin pas rnam par rtog pa'i ngo bo nyid yin par blta bar bya'o // 'jig rten las 'das pa'i byang chub kyi yan lag dran pa la sogs pa gang dag yin pa de dag ni byang chub kyi yan lag yin pas yang dag pa'i shes pa'i ngo bo nyid dang / de bzhin nyid la dmigs pa dang / rnam par gzhag pa'i bden pa rtog pa'i bdag po yin par blta bar bya'o //
translated: The limbs of enlightenment should be understood as the nature of correct knowledge, as having suchness for their object, and as the dominant condition for the conceptualization of the reality of the established truth.🔽The limbs of the path, such as right view, should be understood as the nature of correct knowledge, as having suchness for their object, and as the dominant condition for the conceptualization of the reality of the established truth.

original: yang dag pa'i lta ba la sogs pa lam gyi yan lag rnams kyang gang dag 'jig rten pa yin pa @9b de dag ni snga ma bzhin du blta bar bya'o //
analyzed: yang dag pa'i lta ba la sogs pa lam gyi yan lag rnams kyang gang dag 'jig rten pa yin pa @9b de dag ni snga ma bzhin du blta bar bya'o //
translated: The limbs of the path that are mundane should be understood as before.

original: gang dag 'jig rten las 'das pa de dag ni yang dag pa'i shes pa las tshul khrims kyi yan lag ma rtogs pa'i ngo bo nyid dang / rnam par ma bzhag pa'i bden pa dang / rnam par bzhag pa'i de bzhin nyid la dmigs pa dang /
analyzed: gang dag 'jig rten las 'das pa de dag ni yang dag pa'i shes pa las tshul khrims kyi yan lag ma rtogs pa'i ngo bo nyid dang / rnam par ma bzhag pa'i bden pa dang / rnam par bzhag pa'i de bzhin nyid la dmigs pa dang /
translated: The supramundane are the limbs of morality, etc. , which are the nature of the realization of right knowledge, and which are the bases of the truth that is not established, and of the suchness that is established.

original: zag pa thams cad zad pa mngon du bya ba dang / tshe 'di la bde bar gnas pa'i bdag po yin no //
analyzed: zag pa thams cad zad pa mngon du bya ba dang / tshe 'di la bde bar gnas pa'i bdag po yin no //
translated: They are the causes of the realization of the extinction of all the defilements, and of the happy state in this life.

original: lam gyi yan lag rnams ji lta ba bzhin du /
analyzed: lam gyi yan lag rnams ji lta ba bzhin du /
translated: The limbs of the path should be understood in the same way as the limbs of the way of virtuous endeavor.

original: lam dang / chos kyi gzhi dang / zhi gnas dang / lhag mthong yang de bzhin du blta bar bya'o //🔽de la lam ni /
analyzed: lam dang / chos kyi gzhi dang / zhi gnas dang / lhag mthong yang de bzhin du blta bar bya'o // de la lam ni /
translated: The way, the basis of the teaching, serenity, and insight should be understood in the same way.

original: dbang po rtul po dang / rnon po dang / rnam par gzhag pa dang / tshe 'di la bde bar gnas pa thob pa dang / ma thob pa las rnam par gzhag go //
analyzed: dbang po rtul po dang / rnon po dang / rnam par gzhag pa dang / tshe 'di la bde bar gnas pa thob pa dang / ma thob pa las rnam par gzhag go //
translated: The way is established as being for those of dull and sharp faculties, and for those who have attained and have not attained the happy state in this life.

original: chos kyi gzhi rnams ni brdar btags pa dang / don dam pa pa'i chos 'dzin pa las rnam par gzhag ste /
analyzed: chos kyi gzhi rnams ni brdar btags pa dang / don dam pa pa'i chos 'dzin pa las rnam par gzhag ste /
translated: The basis of the teaching is established as the retention of the conventional and ultimate teachings.

original: lhag pa'i tshul khrims kyi brdar btags pa'i dam pa'i chos 'dzin pa las ni dang po gnyis rnam par gzhag go //
analyzed: lhag pa'i tshul khrims kyi brdar btags pa'i dam pa'i chos 'dzin pa las ni dang po gnyis rnam par gzhag go //
translated: The first two are established from the retention of the holy Dharma that is nominally designated as superior morality.

original: lhag pa'i sems dang / lhag pa'i shes rab kyi don dam pa'i chos 'dzin pa las ni tha ma gnyis rnam par gzhag go //
analyzed: lhag pa'i sems dang / lhag pa'i shes rab kyi don dam pa'i chos 'dzin pa las ni tha ma gnyis rnam par gzhag go //
translated: The last two are established from the retention of the ultimate Dharma that is superior thought and superior wisdom.

original: zhi gnas dang / lhag mthong ni dmigs pa las mi g-yo ba dang / de la yongs su rtog pa'i don gyis rnam par gzhag go //
analyzed: zhi gnas dang / lhag mthong ni dmigs pa las mi g-yo ba dang / de la yongs su rtog pa'i don gyis rnam par gzhag go //
translated: Tranquility and insight are established as the meaning of non-distraction from the objective support and thorough analysis of that, respectively.

original: mtshan ma dang gnas ngan len gyi 'ching ba gnyis las rnam par grol ba'i dbang gis rnam par thar pa brgyad de /
analyzed: mtshan ma dang gnas ngan len gyi 'ching ba gnyis las rnam par grol ba'i dbang gis rnam par thar pa brgyad de /
translated: There are eight liberations due to the power of liberation from the two bonds of signs and bad states.

original: dngos po lnga po de dag la rnam par thar pa brgyad kyi ngo bo nyid ni gang dag yin /
analyzed: dngos po lnga po de dag la rnam par thar pa brgyad kyi ngo bo nyid ni gang dag yin /
translated: What are the natures of the eight liberations with regard to those five things?

original: dmigs pa ni gang dag yin /
analyzed: dmigs pa ni gang dag yin /
translated: What are their objective supports?

original: bdag po ni gang dag yin zhe na ;
analyzed: bdag po ni gang dag yin zhe na ;
translated: What are their dominant conditions?

original: smras pa / 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i yang dag pa'i shes pa'i ngo bo nyid do //
analyzed: smras pa / 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i yang dag pa'i shes pa'i ngo bo nyid do //
translated: It is said: They are by nature mundane and supramundane right knowledge.

original: dang po dang gnyis pa ni gzugs kyi kha dog gi mtshan ma dang / de bzhin nyid la dmigs pa yin no //
analyzed: dang po dang gnyis pa ni gzugs kyi kha dog gi mtshan ma dang / de bzhin nyid la dmigs pa yin no //
translated: The first and second are the signs of the form's color and the observation of suchness.

original: gsum pa ni gzugs nyid kyi phan 'dogs pa'i mtshan ma dang / de'i de bzhin nyid kyi mtshan ma la dmigs pa yin no //
analyzed: gsum pa ni gzugs nyid kyi phan 'dogs pa'i mtshan ma dang / de'i de bzhin nyid kyi mtshan ma la dmigs pa yin no //
translated: The third is the observation of the signs of the form's benefit and the signs of suchness of that.

original: bzhi ni rang gi mtshan ma la dmigs pa dang / de dag gi de bzhin nyid kyi mtshan ma la dmigs pa yin no //
analyzed: bzhi ni rang gi mtshan ma la dmigs pa dang / de dag gi de bzhin nyid kyi mtshan ma la dmigs pa yin no //
translated: The fourth is the observation of the signs of the form itself and the signs of suchness of those.

original: tha ma ni dmigs pa med pa yin no //🔽thams cad kyang 'phags pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi yon tan mngon par sgrub pa @10a * //
analyzed: tha ma ni dmigs pa med pa yin no // thams cad kyang 'phags pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi yon tan mngon par sgrub pa @10a * //
translated: The last is without observation.

original: la bdag po yin no //
analyzed: la bdag po yin no //
translated: All of them are masters of the accomplishment of the qualities of the noble one's supernormal powers.

original: de dag kyang gzugs kyi mtshan ma dang / gzugs med pa'i mtshan ma la dbang po'i sgrib pas bsgribs pa'i rnal 'byor pas sgrib pa de dag spang ba'i phyir rtsom par byed do //
analyzed: de dag kyang gzugs kyi mtshan ma dang / gzugs med pa'i mtshan ma la dbang po'i sgrib pas bsgribs pa'i rnal 'byor pas sgrib pa de dag spang ba'i phyir rtsom par byed do //
translated: Moreover, the yogi who is obscured by the obscuration of the faculties with regard to the signs of form and the signs of formlessness, undertakes to abandon those obscurations.

original: zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched brgyad kyi /
analyzed: zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched brgyad kyi /
translated: The eight spheres of mastery are as follows:

original: dang po bzhi ni 'di lta ste ;
analyzed: dang po bzhi ni 'di lta ste ;
translated: The first four are as follows:

original: dper na rnam par thar pa dang po gnyis dang 'dra'o //
analyzed: dper na rnam par thar pa dang po gnyis dang 'dra'o //
translated: For example, it is like the first two liberations.

original: tha ma bzhi ni 'di lta ste /
analyzed: tha ma bzhi ni 'di lta ste /
translated: The last four are as follows:

original: dper na rnam par thar pa gsum pa dang 'dra'o //
analyzed: dper na rnam par thar pa gsum pa dang 'dra'o //
translated: For example, it is like the third liberation.

original: gzugs zil gyis gnon par dka' ba'i phyir gzugs de zil gyis gnon na /
analyzed: gzugs zil gyis gnon par dka' ba'i phyir gzugs de zil gyis gnon na /
translated: When one overpowers form by over-powering form,

original: gzugs med pa zil gyis gnon pa'i dbang yang 'thob pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gzugs med pa zil gyis gnon pa'i dbang yang 'thob pa'i phyir ro //
translated: one also obtains mastery over over-powering the formless.

original: zil gyis mnan nas shes /
analyzed: zil gyis mnan nas shes /
translated: One knows by over-powering.

original: zil gyis mnan nas mthong bar byed do zhes gang gsungs pa de la /🔽'phags pas ni gzugs kyi mtshan ma dang / de bzhin nyid yid la byed pas zil gyis mnan nas shes /
analyzed: zil gyis mnan nas mthong bar byed do zhes gang gsungs pa de la / 'phags pas ni gzugs kyi mtshan ma dang / de bzhin nyid yid la byed pas zil gyis mnan nas shes /
translated: One sees by over-powering.

original: zil gyis mnan nas mthong ngo //
analyzed: zil gyis mnan nas mthong ngo //
translated: In this regard, the noble one knows by over-powering and sees by over-powering through the attention of the sign of form and suchness.

original: so so'i skye bo'i ni de lta ma yin no //
analyzed: so so'i skye bo'i ni de lta ma yin no //
translated: But the ordinary person does not do it that way.

original: so so skye bos ji ltar zil gyis gnon zhe na /
analyzed: so so skye bos ji ltar zil gyis gnon zhe na /
translated: How does the ordinary person over-power?

original: smras pa / 'du shes gsum gyis te /
analyzed: smras pa / 'du shes gsum gyis te /
translated: It is said: By three perceptions.

original: gzugs sdug pa dang / mi sdug pa la gcig la gcig ltos pa'i 'du shes dang / gcig la gcig ltos pa'i phyir gcig la gcig 'brel pa'i 'du shes dang / gcig la gcig 'brel pa'i phyir gzugs sdug pa dang mi sdug pa la sdug par ro gcig pa'i 'du shes kyis so //
analyzed: gzugs sdug pa dang / mi sdug pa la gcig la gcig ltos pa'i 'du shes dang / gcig la gcig ltos pa'i phyir gcig la gcig 'brel pa'i 'du shes dang / gcig la gcig 'brel pa'i phyir gzugs sdug pa dang mi sdug pa la sdug par ro gcig pa'i 'du shes kyis so //
translated: The notion of the beauty and ugliness of form is the notion of mutual dependence, because beauty and ugliness are mutually dependent. The notion of the unity of taste in the beauty and ugliness of form is the notion of mutual connection, because beauty and ugliness are mutually connected.

original: de ltar so so'i skye bo rnams kyi zil gyis gnon pa tha ma de ni 'phags pa rnams dang thun mong ba yang yin no //
analyzed: de ltar so so'i skye bo rnams kyi zil gyis gnon pa tha ma de ni 'phags pa rnams dang thun mong ba yang yin no //
translated: Thus, the last of the subjugations of ordinary men is also common to the noble ones.

original: zad par gyi skye mched bcu ni zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched kyi stobs kyis blta bar bya'o //
analyzed: zad par gyi skye mched bcu ni zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched kyi stobs kyis blta bar bya'o //
translated: The ten spheres of totality should be understood by the power of the spheres of subjugation.

original: de la bye brag ni 'di yod de /
analyzed: de la bye brag ni 'di yod de /
translated: But there is this difference.

original: 'byung ba'i mtshan ma la dmigs pa dang / de dag gis de bzhin nyid kyi mtshan ma la dmigs pa gang dag yin pa dang / nam mkha' dang rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi mtshan ma la dmigs pa dang / de dag gi de bzhin nyid kyi mtshan ma la dmigs pa yin no //
analyzed: 'byung ba'i mtshan ma la dmigs pa dang / de dag gis de bzhin nyid kyi mtshan ma la dmigs pa gang dag yin pa dang / nam mkha' dang rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi mtshan ma la dmigs pa dang / de dag gi de bzhin nyid kyi mtshan ma la dmigs pa yin no //
translated: The meditative attainment of the base of infinite space focuses on the sign of the base of infinite space and the sign of the reality of the base of infinite space.

original: gzhan du na gnas ma khyab par gnas pa khyab par mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: gzhan du na gnas ma khyab par gnas pa khyab par mi 'gyur te /
translated: Otherwise, if the base is not pervaded, the meditative attainment would not pervade it.

original: dmigs pa pa de ni de bzhin nyid kyi mtshan ma yid la byed pas zad par las khyab par brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: dmigs pa pa de ni de bzhin nyid kyi mtshan ma yid la byed pas zad par las khyab par brjod par bya'o //
translated: That meditative attainment is said to pervade the base of infinite space through the attention that focuses on the sign of the reality of the base of infinite space.

original: zil gyis gnon pa dang zad par khyad par byed pa @10b 'di gnyis kyis ni rnam par thar par rnam par dag pa dang 'phags pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi yon tan mngon par sgrub par byed do /🔽// / bam po sum cu bzhi pa /
analyzed: zil gyis gnon pa dang zad par khyad par byed pa @10b 'di gnyis kyis ni rnam par thar par rnam par dag pa dang 'phags pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi yon tan mngon par sgrub par byed do / // / bam po sum cu bzhi pa /
translated: These two, the bases of subjugation and bases of totality, purify the liberations and establish the qualities of ārya supernatural power.🔽The summary:

original: sdom ni / bsdu dang ngo bo nyid dang ni //
analyzed: sdom ni / bsdu dang ngo bo nyid dang ni //
translated: The summary:

original: gzung dang 'jig tshogs srid pa dang // 'jig rten de nyid yongs tshol dang // yang dag dgongs dang go rims so //
analyzed: gzung dang 'jig tshogs srid pa dang // 'jig rten de nyid yongs tshol dang // yang dag dgongs dang go rims so //
translated: the intention, and the order.

original: rgyu mtshan bden pa du dag gis bsdus she na /
analyzed: rgyu mtshan bden pa du dag gis bsdus she na /
translated: By how many realities are the objects of the three knowledges subsumed?

original: smras pa / rnam par gzhag pa'i bden pa bzhis so //
analyzed: smras pa / rnam par gzhag pa'i bden pa bzhis so //
translated: The three knowledges are subsumed by four realities.

original: ming ni gcig gis te /
analyzed: ming ni gcig gis te /
translated: The name is subsumed by one reality.

original: sdug bsngal gyi bden pas so //
analyzed: sdug bsngal gyi bden pas so //
translated: The name is subsumed by the reality of suffering.

original: rnam par rtog pa ni 'gog pa'i bden pa ma gtogs pa gsum gyis so //
analyzed: rnam par rtog pa ni 'gog pa'i bden pa ma gtogs pa gsum gyis so //
translated: The conceptualization is subsumed by three realities, excluding the reality of cessation.

original: de bzhin nyid ni rnam par ma bzhag pa'i bden pa bzhis so //
analyzed: de bzhin nyid ni rnam par ma bzhag pa'i bden pa bzhis so //
translated: Suchness is subsumed by the four realities, both the established and the non-established.

original: yang dag pa'i shes pa ni rnam par ma bzhag pa dang / rnam par bzhag pa'i bden pa la dmigs pa'i lam gyi bden pas bsdus so //🔽rgyu mtshan gang yin pa de ming yang yin la /
analyzed: yang dag pa'i shes pa ni rnam par ma bzhag pa dang / rnam par bzhag pa'i bden pa la dmigs pa'i lam gyi bden pas bsdus so // rgyu mtshan gang yin pa de ming yang yin la /
translated: Right knowledge is subsumed by the reality of the path, which is both the established and the non-established.🔽Is that which is a sign also a name?🔽Is that which is a name also a sign?

original: ming gang yin pa de yang rgyu mtshan yin nam zhe na /🔽re zhig ming gang yin pa de ni rgyu mtshan yin no //
analyzed: ming gang yin pa de yang rgyu mtshan yin nam zhe na /🔽re zhig ming gang yin pa de ni rgyu mtshan yin no //
translated: That which is a name is a sign.

original: rgyu mtshan yin la ming ma yin pa yang yod de /
analyzed: rgyu mtshan yin la ming ma yin pa yang yod de /
translated: There is a reason that is not a name.

original: ming rgyu mtshan ma gtogs pa de las gzhan pa'i rgyu mtshan bzhi po dag go //
analyzed: ming rgyu mtshan ma gtogs pa de las gzhan pa'i rgyu mtshan bzhi po dag go //
translated: The four reasons other than the name-reason.

original: lhag ma rnams kyang de bzhin du ci rigs par rig par bya'o //🔽rgyu mtshan gang yin pa de thams cad rgyu mtshan rgyu mtshan yang yin la /
analyzed: lhag ma rnams kyang de bzhin du ci rigs par rig par bya'o // rgyu mtshan gang yin pa de thams cad rgyu mtshan rgyu mtshan yang yin la /
translated: The rest should be understood in the same way, as appropriate.🔽Is every reason a reason-reason?

original: rgyu mtshan rgyu mtshan gang yin pa de thams cad kyang rgyu mtshan yin nam zhe na /
analyzed: rgyu mtshan rgyu mtshan gang yin pa de thams cad kyang rgyu mtshan yin nam zhe na /
translated: Are all reason-reasons also reasons?

original: re zhig rgyu mtshan rgyu mtshan gang yin pa de ni rgyu mtshan yin no //
analyzed: re zhig rgyu mtshan rgyu mtshan gang yin pa de ni rgyu mtshan yin no //
translated: Every reason-reason is a reason.

original: rgyu mtshan yin la rgyu mtshan rgyu mtshan ma yin pa yang yod de /
analyzed: rgyu mtshan yin la rgyu mtshan rgyu mtshan ma yin pa yang yod de /
translated: There is a reason that is not a reason-reason.

original: ming rgyu mtshan la sogs pa bzhi po dag go //
analyzed: ming rgyu mtshan la sogs pa bzhi po dag go //
translated: The four, such as the name-reason, etc.

original: rgyu mtshan rgyu mtshan la rnam par rtog par byed pa gang yin pa de thams cad ming dang rgyu mtshan dang ldan pa'i 'brel ba la rnam par rtog par byed pa yin nam /
analyzed: rgyu mtshan rgyu mtshan la rnam par rtog par byed pa gang yin pa de thams cad ming dang rgyu mtshan dang ldan pa'i 'brel ba la rnam par rtog par byed pa yin nam /
translated: Is every conceptualization of a reason-reason a conceptualization of a reason and a reason-reason?

original: ming rgyu mtshan la rnam par rtog par byed pa gang yin pa de thams cad rgyu mtshan rgyu mtshan dang ldan pa'i 'brel ba la rnam par rtog par byed pa yin nam zhe na /
analyzed: ming rgyu mtshan la rnam par rtog par byed pa gang yin pa de thams cad rgyu mtshan rgyu mtshan dang ldan pa'i 'brel ba la rnam par rtog par byed pa yin nam zhe na /
translated: Is it the case that all conceptualization of a name is conceptualization of a reason and conceptualization of a reason as related to a reason?

original: mu bzhi ste /🔽rgyu mtshan rgyu mtshan la rnam par rtog par byed la /
analyzed: mu bzhi ste / rgyu mtshan rgyu mtshan la rnam par rtog par byed la /
translated: There are four possibilities.

original: ming rgyu mtshan dang ldan pa'i 'brel pa la rnam par rtog par byed pa ma yin pa yang yod de /🔽ming ma rtogs pa'i rgyu @11a * //
analyzed: ming rgyu mtshan dang ldan pa'i 'brel pa la rnam par rtog par byed pa ma yin pa yang yod de / ming ma rtogs pa'i rgyu @11a * //
translated: There is conceptualization of a reason but not conceptualization of a name as related to a reason.

original: mtshan la rnam par rtog pa'i rgyu mtshan dang / ming gi bag la nyal bsal ba gang yin pa'o //
analyzed: mtshan la rnam par rtog pa'i rgyu mtshan dang / ming gi bag la nyal bsal ba gang yin pa'o //
translated: This is conceptualization of a reason that does not understand a name and the elimination of the latent predispositions for a name.

original: ming rgyu mtshan la rnam par rtog par byed pa rgyu mtshan rgyu mtshan dang ldan pa'i 'brel pa la rnam par rtog par mi byed pa yang yod de /
analyzed: ming rgyu mtshan la rnam par rtog par byed pa rgyu mtshan rgyu mtshan dang ldan pa'i 'brel pa la rnam par rtog par mi byed pa yang yod de /
translated: There is conceptualization of a name as a reason but not conceptualization of a reason as related to a reason.

original: dngos po ma rtogs pa'i ming la rnam par rtog pa'i rgyu mtshan gang yin pa'o //
analyzed: dngos po ma rtogs pa'i ming la rnam par rtog pa'i rgyu mtshan gang yin pa'o //
translated: This is conceptualization of a reason that does not understand a thing.

original: de las bzlog pa ni gnyi ga yin no //
analyzed: de las bzlog pa ni gnyi ga yin no //
translated: The opposite of these is both.

original: rnam pa de dag ma gtogs pa ni gnyi ga ma yin no //🔽de bzhin nyid yid la byed pa gang yin pa des de bzhin nyid kho na mthong bar 'gyur ram /
analyzed: rnam pa de dag ma gtogs pa ni gnyi ga ma yin no // de bzhin nyid yid la byed pa gang yin pa des de bzhin nyid kho na mthong bar 'gyur ram /
translated: The other aspects are neither.🔽Is it only by attending to reality that one sees reality?

original: de bzhin nyid mthong bar 'gyur ba gang yin pa de de bzhin nyid kho na yid la byed pa yin zhe na /
analyzed: de bzhin nyid mthong bar 'gyur ba gang yin pa de de bzhin nyid kho na yid la byed pa yin zhe na /
translated: Or is it that one sees reality only by attending to reality?

original: mu bzhi ste /
analyzed: mu bzhi ste /
translated: There are four possibilities.

original: de bzhin nyid yid la byed la de bzhin nyid mthong bar mi 'gyur ba yang yod de /
analyzed: de bzhin nyid yid la byed la de bzhin nyid mthong bar mi 'gyur ba yang yod de /
translated: One attends to reality but does not see reality.

original: rnam par rtog pas bsdus pa'i yid la byed pas de bzhin nyid yid la byed pa na /🔽ji srid du ma rtogs kyi bar du de bzhin nyid kyi mtshan ma ni mthong bar 'gyur /
analyzed: rnam par rtog pas bsdus pa'i yid la byed pas de bzhin nyid yid la byed pa na / ji srid du ma rtogs kyi bar du de bzhin nyid kyi mtshan ma ni mthong bar 'gyur /
translated: When one attends to reality by a mental attention that is conceptual,🔽one sees the sign of reality but not reality itself, until one penetrates it.

original: de bzhin nyid ni mthong bar mi 'gyur zhing rtogs par mi 'gyur ba'i bar dang / rtogs par gyur na yang de'i 'og tu rnam par gzhag pa'i de bzhin nyid yid la byed pa'o //
analyzed: de bzhin nyid ni mthong bar mi 'gyur zhing rtogs par mi 'gyur ba'i bar dang / rtogs par gyur na yang de'i 'og tu rnam par gzhag pa'i de bzhin nyid yid la byed pa'o //
translated: When one penetrates it, one attends to reality as it is established.

original: de bzhin nyid mthong bar 'gyur ba la de bzhin nyid yid la mi byed pa yang yod de ;
analyzed: de bzhin nyid mthong bar 'gyur ba la de bzhin nyid yid la mi byed pa yang yod de ;
translated: There is a way of attending to suchness that is not attention to suchness,

original: de bzhin nyid rtogs par byed pa'i tshe na don dam par mtshan ma med pa yid la byed pa'o //
analyzed: de bzhin nyid rtogs par byed pa'i tshe na don dam par mtshan ma med pa yid la byed pa'o //
translated: which is to attend to the ultimate absence of signs when realizing suchness.

original: de bzhin nyid kyang mthong la de bzhin nyid kho na yid la byed par 'gyur ba yang yod de /
analyzed: de bzhin nyid kyang mthong la de bzhin nyid kho na yid la byed par 'gyur ba yang yod de /
translated: There is a way of attending to suchness that is attention to suchness itself,

original: rtog pa'i 'og tu rnam par ma bzhag pa'i de bzhin nyid rgyun du yid la byed pa'o //
analyzed: rtog pa'i 'og tu rnam par ma bzhag pa'i de bzhin nyid rgyun du yid la byed pa'o //
translated: which is to attend continuously to suchness that is not posited subsequent to conceptualization.

original: de bzhin nyid kyang mi mthong ba de bzhin nyid yid la byed par yang mi 'gyur ba yang yod de /
analyzed: de bzhin nyid kyang mi mthong ba de bzhin nyid yid la byed par yang mi 'gyur ba yang yod de /
translated: There is a way of attending to suchness that is not attention to suchness,

original: rigs pas bskyed pa med pa'i yid la byed pas mtshan ma yid la byed pa'o //
analyzed: rigs pas bskyed pa med pa'i yid la byed pas mtshan ma yid la byed pa'o //
translated: which is to attend to signs with an attention that is not generated by reasoning.

original: mtshan ma yid la byed pa gang yin pa des /🔽mtshan ma nyid yang dag par rjes su mthong bar 'gyur ram ;
analyzed: mtshan ma yid la byed pa gang yin pa des / mtshan ma nyid yang dag par rjes su mthong bar 'gyur ram ;
translated: With that attention to signs,🔽does one see signs themselves?🔽With that seeing of signs,

original: mtshan ma yang dag par rjes su mthong ba des mtshan ma nyid yid la byed ce na /
analyzed: mtshan ma yang dag par rjes su mthong ba des mtshan ma nyid yid la byed ce na /
translated: does one attend to signs themselves?

original: mu bzhi ste /
analyzed: mu bzhi ste /
translated: There are four possibilities.

original: mtshan ma yid la byed la mtshan ma mthong bar mi 'gyur ba yang yod de /
analyzed: mtshan ma yid la byed la mtshan ma mthong bar mi 'gyur ba yang yod de /
translated: There is the case where one does not see the sign, but one does attend to the sign.

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: For example,

original: dper na mu gnyis pa lta bu'o //
analyzed: dper na mu gnyis pa lta bu'o //
translated: like the second possibility.

original: mtshan ma mthong la mtshan ma yid la byed par @11b mi 'gyur ba yang yod de /
analyzed: mtshan ma mthong la mtshan ma yid la byed par @11b mi 'gyur ba yang yod de /
translated: There is the case where one attends to the sign, but one does not see the sign.

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: For example,

original: dper na mu dang po lta bu'o //
analyzed: dper na mu dang po lta bu'o //
translated: like the first possibility.

original: mtshan ma yang yid la byed la mtshan ma nyid mthong bar 'gyur ba yang yod de /
analyzed: mtshan ma yang yid la byed la mtshan ma nyid mthong bar 'gyur ba yang yod de /
translated: There is the case where one attends to the sign and one also sees the sign.

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: For example,

original: dper na mu bzhi pa lta bu'o //
analyzed: dper na mu bzhi pa lta bu'o //
translated: like the fourth possibility.

original: mtshan ma yang yid la byed la mtshan ma mthong bar mi 'gyur ba yang yod de /
analyzed: mtshan ma yang yid la byed la mtshan ma mthong bar mi 'gyur ba yang yod de /
translated: There is the case where one does not attend to the sign and one does not see the sign.

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: For example,

original: dper na mu gsum pa lta bu'o //
analyzed: dper na mu gsum pa lta bu'o //
translated: like the third possibility.

original: ci dngos po lnga po de dag gis chos thams cad bsdus pa yin nam /
analyzed: ci dngos po lnga po de dag gis chos thams cad bsdus pa yin nam /
translated: Are all phenomena included in these five categories?

original: 'on te ma yin zhe na /
analyzed: 'on te ma yin zhe na /
translated: Or are some not included?

original: smras pa yin no //
analyzed: smras pa yin no //
translated: It is said that they are included.

original: chos de dag gis ngo bo nyid gang yin par brjod par bya zhe na /
analyzed: chos de dag gis ngo bo nyid gang yin par brjod par bya zhe na /
translated: What is the nature of these phenomena?

original: smras pa / brjod du med pa'i ngo bo yid yin no //
analyzed: smras pa / brjod du med pa'i ngo bo yid yin no //
translated: It is said: The mind is the nature of the inexpressible.

original: de dag gi mtshan nyid ji lta bu yin par blta bar bya zhe na /
analyzed: de dag gi mtshan nyid ji lta bu yin par blta bar bya zhe na /
translated: What should be seen as their characteristics?

original: smras pa / sgyu ma lta bu'i mtshan nyid yin gyi /
analyzed: smras pa / sgyu ma lta bu'i mtshan nyid yin gyi /
translated: It is said: They have the characteristic of illusion.

original: med pa nyid ni ma yin te /
analyzed: med pa nyid ni ma yin te /
translated: They are not nonexistent.

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: It is like this:

original: dper na sgyu ma'i las nyid kyis ni yod la /
analyzed: dper na sgyu ma'i las nyid kyis ni yod la /
translated: The illusion itself exists,

original: rta dang glang po che dang / shing rta dang / dpung bu chung dang / nor bu dang / mu tig dang / gser dang ; dngul la sogs pa'i ngo bo nyid du ni yod pa ma yin pa de bzhin du ngo bo nyid kyang ming dang mtshan ma tsam nyid du ni yod la /
analyzed: rta dang glang po che dang / shing rta dang / dpung bu chung dang / nor bu dang / mu tig dang / gser dang ; dngul la sogs pa'i ngo bo nyid du ni yod pa ma yin pa de bzhin du ngo bo nyid kyang ming dang mtshan ma tsam nyid du ni yod la /
translated: but the nature of horses, elephants, chariots, foot soldiers, jewels, pearls, gold, silver, and so on does not exist. In the same way, the nature exists as mere names and signs,

original: ngo bo nyid dang / khyad par du gdags par snang ba'i dngos por ni yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: ngo bo nyid dang / khyad par du gdags par snang ba'i dngos por ni yod pa ma yin no //
translated: but the entities that appear as the designations of nature and attributes do not exist.

original: rgyu mtshan rgyu mtshan zhes bya ba'i ming des rgyu mtshan gyis ngo bo nyid dmigs su med do //
analyzed: rgyu mtshan rgyu mtshan zhes bya ba'i ming des rgyu mtshan gyis ngo bo nyid dmigs su med do //
translated: The sign is not apprehended as the nature of the sign by the name “sign.”

original: rgyu mtshan ji lta ba de bzhin du ming gis ming gi ngo bo nyid dang / rnam par rtog pas rnam par rtog pa'i ngo bo nyid dang / de bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin nyid kyi ngo bo nyid dang / yang dag pa'i shes pas yang dag pa'i shes pa zhes bya ba'i ming des yang dag pa'i shes pa'i ngo bo nyid dmigs su med do //
analyzed: rgyu mtshan ji lta ba de bzhin du ming gis ming gi ngo bo nyid dang / rnam par rtog pas rnam par rtog pa'i ngo bo nyid dang / de bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin nyid kyi ngo bo nyid dang / yang dag pa'i shes pas yang dag pa'i shes pa zhes bya ba'i ming des yang dag pa'i shes pa'i ngo bo nyid dmigs su med do //
translated: For the same reason, the name of a name, the nature of a name, the thought of a thought, the nature of a thought, the reality of reality, the nature of reality, and the cognition of a cognition, the nature of a cognition, are not apprehended by that name, that thought, that reality, or that cognition.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: de'i ngo bo nyid rnam pa thams cad du mi 'thad pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de'i ngo bo nyid rnam pa thams cad du mi 'thad pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because their nature is not tenable in any way.

original: gal te ngo bo nyid gang gis rgyu mtshan rnam par gzhag pa de la de dang mthun pa nyid kyi ming nye bar 'dogs par byed pa'i phyir nye bar 'dogs pa ni rgyu mtshan la rag las pa yin no zhe na /
analyzed: gal te ngo bo nyid gang gis rgyu mtshan rnam par gzhag pa de la de dang mthun pa nyid kyi ming nye bar 'dogs par byed pa'i phyir nye bar 'dogs pa ni rgyu mtshan la rag las pa yin no zhe na /
translated: If you think that since a name is applied to a reason in accordance with that nature, designation depends on a reason,

original: des na nye bar 'dogs pa'i sngon rol na /
analyzed: des na nye bar 'dogs pa'i sngon rol na /
translated: then before designation,

original: ji ltar ming rnam par gzhag pa bzhin du rgyu mtshan la de'i blo 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang / rgyu mtshan gcig la yang nye bar 'dogs pa mang ba'i phyir dang / sna tshogs pa'i phyir bdag nyid mang po 'thob par 'gyur bas /
analyzed: ji ltar ming rnam par gzhag pa bzhin du rgyu mtshan la de'i blo 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang / rgyu mtshan gcig la yang nye bar 'dogs pa mang ba'i phyir dang / sna tshogs pa'i phyir bdag nyid mang po 'thob par 'gyur bas /
translated: Just as the mind arises in regard to the reason in accordance with the way the name is posited, and because many designations are made in regard to a single reason, and because of the variety of reasons, the self would obtain many natures.

original: @12a * // de'i phyir nye bar 'dogs pa rgyu mtshan la rag las par mi rung ngo //
analyzed: @12a * // de'i phyir nye bar 'dogs pa rgyu mtshan la rag las par mi rung ngo //
translated: Therefore it is not tenable that designation depends on a reason.

original: gal te ji ltar rgyu mtshan la ming rnam par 'jog par byed pa de bzhin du ming gi dbang gis rgyu mtshan gyi ngo bo de nyid 'byung bar 'gyur ro zhe na /
analyzed: gal te ji ltar rgyu mtshan la ming rnam par 'jog par byed pa de bzhin du ming gi dbang gis rgyu mtshan gyi ngo bo de nyid 'byung bar 'gyur ro zhe na /
translated: If, just as the name is posited in regard to the reason, the nature of the reason itself arises by the power of the name,

original: des na nye bar 'dogs pa'i sngon rol na rgyu mtshan gyi ngo po nyid med par 'gyur te /
analyzed: des na nye bar 'dogs pa'i sngon rol na rgyu mtshan gyi ngo po nyid med par 'gyur te /
translated: then prior to designation the nature of the reason would not exist.

original: de med na nye bar 'dogs pa yang med par 'gyur bas de'i phyir de gnyi ga yang med par thal bar 'gyur ba dang / nye bar 'dogs pa mang ba'i phyir dang / sna tshogs pa'i phyir bdag nyid mang po nyid dang / gzhan gyi dbang du 'gyur ba'i skyon du yang 'gyur ro //🔽gzhan gyi dbang du 'gyur pa ni rgyu mtshan la nye bar 'dogs pas de'i phyir nye bar 'dogs pa thams cad kyis /
analyzed: de med na nye bar 'dogs pa yang med par 'gyur bas de'i phyir de gnyi ga yang med par thal bar 'gyur ba dang / nye bar 'dogs pa mang ba'i phyir dang / sna tshogs pa'i phyir bdag nyid mang po nyid dang / gzhan gyi dbang du 'gyur ba'i skyon du yang 'gyur ro // gzhan gyi dbang du 'gyur pa ni rgyu mtshan la nye bar 'dogs pas de'i phyir nye bar 'dogs pa thams cad kyis /
translated: And because of the multiplicity of designations and their variety, the error of the self being multiple and dependent would ensue.

original: de'i bdag nyid kyi ngo bo nyid yin par mi rung ste /
analyzed: de'i bdag nyid kyi ngo bo nyid yin par mi rung ste /
translated: The error of being dependent is that the self would be dependent on the reason for designation. Therefore, it is not tenable that the self is the intrinsic reality of all designations.

original: sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i lus sna tshogs grub pa dang 'dra ste /
analyzed: sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i lus sna tshogs grub pa dang 'dra ste /
translated: It would be like the various bodies of an illusory person.

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: For example,

original: dper na sgyu ma mkhan gyis skyes ba dang / bud med dang / glang po che dang / rta dang / dom dang / dred kyi lus la sogs pa'i lus sna tshogs kyis sgyu ma'i skyes bu mngon par 'du byed pa de ni lus gang gis bdag nyid kyang ma yin pa de bzhin du /
analyzed: dper na sgyu ma mkhan gyis skyes ba dang / bud med dang / glang po che dang / rta dang / dom dang / dred kyi lus la sogs pa'i lus sna tshogs kyis sgyu ma'i skyes bu mngon par 'du byed pa de ni lus gang gis bdag nyid kyang ma yin pa de bzhin du /
translated: For example, a magician creates various bodies such as the bodies of men, women, elephants, horses, bears, and hyenas.

original: rgyu mtshan yang nye bar 'dogs pa thams cad kyis de'i bdag nyid ma yin par blta bar bya'o //🔽gal te rgyu mtshan dang nye bar 'dogs pa gnyi ga 'dus pas de dang bral ba'i ngo bo nyid skyed par byed na ni des na de'i rgyu mtshan nam /🔽ming ngam / de gnyi ga'am /
analyzed: rgyu mtshan yang nye bar 'dogs pa thams cad kyis de'i bdag nyid ma yin par blta bar bya'o // gal te rgyu mtshan dang nye bar 'dogs pa gnyi ga 'dus pas de dang bral ba'i ngo bo nyid skyed par byed na ni des na de'i rgyu mtshan nam / ming ngam / de gnyi ga'am /
translated: Just as that magician does not have the nature of any of those bodies, so too, all designations of reasons should be seen as not having that nature.

original: bar mdo zhig yin par dmigs pa'i rigs ni mi dmigs te /
analyzed: bar mdo zhig yin par dmigs pa'i rigs ni mi dmigs te /
translated: If the nature of the absence of that were produced by the combination of both the reason and the designation, then it would be reasonable to observe that reason, or the designation, or both of them, or something in between.🔽But it is not observed.

original: de'i phyir de yang mi rung ngo //
analyzed: de'i phyir de yang mi rung ngo //
translated: Therefore, that is also unreasonable.

original: de lta bas na ngo bo nyid ni tha snyad las byung ba yin no //
analyzed: de lta bas na ngo bo nyid ni tha snyad las byung ba yin no //
translated: Thus, the nature is derived from convention.

original: gal te nye bar 'dogs pa ni ngo bo nyid rnams kyi mngon par gsal bar byed pa yin par 'dod na /
analyzed: gal te nye bar 'dogs pa ni ngo bo nyid rnams kyi mngon par gsal bar byed pa yin par 'dod na /
translated: If you maintain that the designation is the manifestation of the intrinsic natures,

original: de ltar yang mi rung ste /🔽bzung nas sam /
analyzed: de ltar yang mi rung ste / bzung nas sam /
translated: that also is not tenable.🔽Because the error of designation would occur

original: ma bzung bar nye bar 'dogs pa'i skyon du 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ma bzung bar nye bar 'dogs pa'i skyon du 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
translated: whether or not the intrinsic natures are apprehended.

original: gal te rgyu mtshan bzung nas nye bar 'dogs par byed na ni mngon par gsal bar byed pa yin par mi rung ngo //
analyzed: gal te rgyu mtshan bzung nas nye bar 'dogs par byed na ni mngon par gsal bar byed pa yin par mi rung ngo //
translated: If you designate after apprehending the intrinsic natures, then it is not tenable that they are manifested.

original: ji ste rgyu mtshan ma bzung bar nye bar 'dogs par byed na ni gzhi med par nye bar 'dogs pa mi rung ngo //
analyzed: ji ste rgyu mtshan ma bzung bar nye bar 'dogs par byed na ni gzhi med par nye bar 'dogs pa mi rung ngo //
translated: But if you designate without apprehending the intrinsic natures, then it is not tenable that designation occurs without a basis.

original: snga ma bzhin du bdag nyid du ma yin pa'i skyon du @12b yang 'gyur te /
analyzed: snga ma bzhin du bdag nyid du ma yin pa'i skyon du @12b yang 'gyur te /
translated: And the error that the intrinsic natures are not themselves would occur, as before.

original: nye bar 'dogs pa rnams ni mang po sna tshogs yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: nye bar 'dogs pa rnams ni mang po sna tshogs yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the designations are many and various.

original: gsal bar byed pa'i dpe ni mi mthun pa yin pas mi rung ste /
analyzed: gsal bar byed pa'i dpe ni mi mthun pa yin pas mi rung ste /
translated: The example of manifestation is not tenable because it is not similar.

original: de la mi mthun pa ni 'di yin te /
analyzed: de la mi mthun pa ni 'di yin te /
translated: This is the dissimilarity.

original: snang zhing mngon par gsal bar byed pa'i rgyu ni thams cad la bye brag med pa dang / sna tshogs pa yang yin la nye bar 'dogs pa ni de ltar 'dzin pa'i rgyu ni de lta ma yin pa'o //
analyzed: snang zhing mngon par gsal bar byed pa'i rgyu ni thams cad la bye brag med pa dang / sna tshogs pa yang yin la nye bar 'dogs pa ni de ltar 'dzin pa'i rgyu ni de lta ma yin pa'o //
translated: The cause of appearance and clear manifestation is the same for all, and it is also various. But the cause of the apprehension of that is not like that.

original: gang gi phyir brjod du med par brjod par yang brjod du med pa zhes bya bar brjod par snang ba de'i phyir /
analyzed: gang gi phyir brjod du med par brjod par yang brjod du med pa zhes bya bar brjod par snang ba de'i phyir /
translated: Because the inexpressible is expressed as “inexpressible,”

original: brjod du med pa zhes bya bar mi rung la /
analyzed: brjod du med pa zhes bya bar mi rung la /
translated: it is not suitable to say “inexpressible.”

original: sgyu ma'i skyes bu lus sna tshogs su grub pa de dag gis de'i bdag nyid ma yin yang /
analyzed: sgyu ma'i skyes bu lus sna tshogs su grub pa de dag gis de'i bdag nyid ma yin yang /
translated: Although those illusory beings who have various bodies are not of that nature,

original: sgyu ma'i skyes bu lus sna tshogs su grub pa de'i bdag nyid yin pas /
analyzed: sgyu ma'i skyes bu lus sna tshogs su grub pa de'i bdag nyid yin pas /
translated: they are of the nature of the illusory beings who have various bodies.

original: de'i phyir yang dpe mi mthun pa yin no zhe na /
analyzed: de'i phyir yang dpe mi mthun pa yin no zhe na /
translated: Therefore, the example is not similar.

original: smras pa / brjod du med pa de brjod du med do zhes dam bcas pa'i tshe kho na dgag pa byas zin pas de la nyes pa med do //
analyzed: smras pa / brjod du med pa de brjod du med do zhes dam bcas pa'i tshe kho na dgag pa byas zin pas de la nyes pa med do //
translated: We say: When the inexpressible is asserted to be inexpressible, negation is already accomplished, so there is no fault in that.

original: don de nyid rtogs par bya ba'i phyir sbyor bar byed pa yin no //
analyzed: don de nyid rtogs par bya ba'i phyir sbyor bar byed pa yin no //
translated: In order to understand that meaning, one should apply oneself.

original: 'dra ba'i phyir dpe mi mthun pa yang ma yin la nye bar 'dogs pa dag gis de'i bdag nyid kyang ma yin zhing /
analyzed: 'dra ba'i phyir dpe mi mthun pa yang ma yin la nye bar 'dogs pa dag gis de'i bdag nyid kyang ma yin zhing /
translated: It is not that the example is not similar, nor is it that the identity of the example is not figurative.

original: brjod du med pa'i don med pa yang ma yin no //
analyzed: brjod du med pa'i don med pa yang ma yin no //
translated: Nor is it that the inexpressible meaning is nonexistent.

original: gal te ming gis nye bar 'dogs par byed na ni rgyu mtshan gyi dngos po srid par 'gyur la /
analyzed: gal te ming gis nye bar 'dogs par byed na ni rgyu mtshan gyi dngos po srid par 'gyur la /
translated: If one applies oneself through names, then the existence of the basis of the reason would be possible.

original: mi byed na ni mi srid par 'gyur na ni de lta na chos mthun pa'i dpe yang rung bar 'gyur la /
analyzed: mi byed na ni mi srid par 'gyur na ni de lta na chos mthun pa'i dpe yang rung bar 'gyur la /
translated: If one does not apply oneself, then the nonexistence of the basis of the reason would be possible. In that case, the example of the similar property would be suitable.

original: brjod du med par rtog pa yang rigs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: brjod du med par rtog pa yang rigs par 'gyur ro //
translated: And the conception of the inexpressible would be reasonable.

original: gal te de lta ma yin na /
analyzed: gal te de lta ma yin na /
translated: If it were not so,

original: de'i phyir brjod du med par rtog pa ni don med pa yin no zhe na /
analyzed: de'i phyir brjod du med par rtog pa ni don med pa yin no zhe na /
translated: then the conception of the inexpressible would be meaningless.

original: smras pa / sa'i dngos gzhir rnam par rtog pa snga ma rnam pa brgyad las da ltar byung ba'i dngos po rnam pa gsum 'byung bar 'gyur ro zhes ji skad bstan pa yin te /
analyzed: smras pa / sa'i dngos gzhir rnam par rtog pa snga ma rnam pa brgyad las da ltar byung ba'i dngos po rnam pa gsum 'byung bar 'gyur ro zhes ji skad bstan pa yin te /
translated: In the Levels of Yogic Deeds, it is taught that from the eight previous types of conception, three types of present things arise.

original: 'byung ba'i dngos po rnam pa gsum po de yang rnam par rtog pa rnams kun tu skyed pa'i phyir 'byung bas yin te /
analyzed: 'byung ba'i dngos po rnam pa gsum po de yang rnam par rtog pa rnams kun tu skyed pa'i phyir 'byung bas yin te /
translated: And those three types of present things arise from conception, because they are produced by conception.

original: de ltar 'brel ba'i tshul gyis kun nas nyon mongs pa rgyun mi 'chad par 'gyur ba'i de'i phyir dpe ni chos mthun pa yin no /
analyzed: de ltar 'brel ba'i tshul gyis kun nas nyon mongs pa rgyun mi 'chad par 'gyur ba'i de'i phyir dpe ni chos mthun pa yin no /
translated: Thus, the analogy is similar in the way that the continuity of the afflictions is uninterrupted.

original: rnam par rtog pa'i nye bar 'dogs pa spangs na /
